name: Attract And Repel
description:
A puzzle-ish game where you play as a spherical robot that can only move through the attraction and repulsion of nearby metals. Often, a tug or push will move both you and the metal. 

Left click on any metal to push off, and right click to pull toward it. R to reset the stage.

This game was meant as a quick 10-stage proof of concept from when I couldn't sleep one night. Please let me know what you think and whether you would like more challenges like these.
